resources.string: Select your mood of the day

If you want the full experience and benefits of using this MOOD TRACKER, you should do it on a daily basis. 

It will definitely help you track your mood swings and it will show you at the end which was your mood of the month. 

Alone, this app won't do much for your mental health, so it's on you to make some changes in your life and chase the good feelings and let the all the other emotions go away.
